pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, January 31, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, January 31, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Winnipeg, Manitoba

Note: All times local

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting of the Prime Minister’s Youth Council.

Room P107, Roblin Centre
Red River College
160 Princess Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2 p.m.

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

University of Manitoba, Investors Group Athletic Centre
75 Sidney Smith Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive at the main entrance no later than 6 p.m.

Media appearances

  • 8:10 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One Winnipeg.
  • 8:18 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Radio-Canada Manitoba, Le 6 à 9.
  • 10:05 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CJOB radio Winnipeg.
